mapper.select: SELECT FIELD_CATEGORY_ID, FIELD_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_FIELD_CATEGORY ORDER BY FIELD_CATEGORY_ID

SELECT P3.FIELD_ID, P3.LAWYER_ID, P3.LAWYER_FIELD_ID, P3.LAWYER_IMAGE, P3.LAWYER_NAME, P3.LAWYER_ADDRESS, P3.LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, P3.CALL_PRICE, P3.VIDEO_PRICE, P3.VISIT_PRICE, P3.REVIEW_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P2.FIELD_ID, P2.LAWYER_ID, P2.LAWYER_FIELD_ID, P2.LAWYER_IMAGE, P2.LAWYER_NAME, P2.LAWYER_ADDRESS, P2.LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, P2.CALL_PRICE, P2.VIDEO_PRICE, P2.VISIT_PRICE, P2.REVIEW_COUNT FROM (SELECT LF.FIELD_ID, LF.LAWYER_ID, LF.LAWYER_FIELD_ID, L.LAWYER_IMAGE, L.LAWYER_NAME, L.LAWYER_ADDRESS, L.LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, L.CALL_PRICE, L.VIDEO_PRICE, L.VISIT_PRICE, P1.REVIEW_COUNT FROM TBL_LAWYER_FIELD LF JOIN TBL_LAWYER L ON LF.LAWYER_ID = L.LAWYER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(CR.CONSULTING_REVIEW_ID) "REVIEW_COUNT", R.LAWYER_ID FROM TBL_CONSULTING_REVIEW CR JOIN TBL_RESERVATION R ON CR.RESERVATION_ID = R.RESERVATION_ID GROUP BY R.LAWYER_ID) P1 ON LF.LAWYER_ID = P1.LAWYER_ID WHERE LF.FIELD_ID = #{fieldId} ORDER BY P1.REVIEW_COUNT) P2
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow} ) P3 WHERE P3.R >= #{pagination.startRow}
